title: Apple Opens PCC Source Code for Researchers to Identify Bugs in Cloud AI Security
description: Apple has publicly made available its Private Cloud Compute (PCC) Virtual Research Environment (VRE), allowing the research community to inspect and verify the privacy and security guarantees of its offering.
